00027 OctreeZone.h  -  Portal Connected Zone (OctreeZone) header file.
00028 
00029 OctreeZones are a type of PCZone.  Octree Zones partition their space into
00030 Octants.  For details on Zones in general, see PCZone.h/cpp.
00031 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00032 begin                : Mon Apr 16 2007
00033 author               : Eric Cha
00034 email                : ericc@xenopi.com
00035 Code Style Update    :
00036 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 */
00038

00217     class _OgreOctreeZonePluginExport OctreeZoneData : public ZoneData
00218     {
00219     public:
00221         OctreeZoneData(PCZSceneNode *, PCZone * );
00223         ~OctreeZoneData();

00226 
00229         Octree * getOctant()
00230         {
00231             return mOctant;
00232         };
00235         void setOctant( Octree *o )
00236         {
00237             mOctant = o;
00238         };
00239         bool _isIn( AxisAlignedBox &box );
00240 
00241     public:
00243         Octree *        mOctant;
00244         // octree-specific world bounding box (only includes attached objects, not children)
00245         AxisAlignedBox  mOctreeWorldAABB;
00246     };
